name: Kingpin
details: Wilson Fisk, also known as the Kingpin, is a powerful crime lord in New York City.
lairLocation: Fisk Tower, New York City, USA

name: Lex Luthor
details: Lex Luthor is a wealthy businessman and the archenemy of Superman, operating from LexCorp Tower.
lairLocation: LexCorp Tower, New York City, USA

name: Joker
details: The Joker is a criminal mastermind and Batman's greatest foe, often operating from abandoned locations.
lairLocation: Coney Island, New York City, USA

name: Ra's al Ghul
details: Ra's al Ghul is an immortal eco-terrorist who leads the League of Assassins.

name: Magneto
details: Magneto, born Erik Lehnsherr, is a powerful mutant with the ability to control magnetism.

name: Red Skull
details: Johann Schmidt, also known as Red Skull, is a former Nazi officer and the leader of Hydra.

name: Rasputin
details: Rasputin is a mystic and a villain in the Hellboy universe, often connected with Siberia.

name: The Penguin
details: Oswald Cobblepot, known as the Penguin, is a Gotham City crime lord who runs the Iceberg Lounge.
lairLocation: Iceberg Lounge, New York City, USA

name: Victor Zsasz
details: Victor Zsasz is a sadistic serial killer who operates out of abandoned buildings in Gotham City.
lairLocation: Abandoned buildings, Gotham City (New York City), USA

name: The Mandarin
details: The Mandarin is a powerful warlord with ten mystical rings, operating from a hidden fortress in China.

name: Carmine Falcone
details: Carmine Falcone is a mafia boss in Gotham City, controlling the criminal underworld.
lairLocation: Various mafia hideouts, Gotham City (New York City), USA

name: Hugo Strange
details: Hugo Strange is a brilliant but insane psychiatrist who often operates out of Arkham Asylum.
lairLocation: Arkham Asylum, Gotham City (New York City), USA

name: Talia al Ghul
details: Talia al Ghul is the daughter of Ra's al Ghul and a leader of the League of Assassins.

name: Bane
details: Bane is a supervillain known for his immense strength and intelligence, often associated with Peña Duro Prison.

name: Scarecrow
details: Jonathan Crane, known as Scarecrow, is a master of fear who uses toxins to terrorize Gotham.
lairLocation: Abandoned Asylum, Gotham City (New York City), USA

name: Lady Shiva
details: Lady Shiva is one of the deadliest assassins in the world, often operating in Hong Kong.

name: Cheetah
details: Barbara Ann Minerva, known as Cheetah, is an archaeologist turned supervillain, operating from the Amazon.

name: Vulture
details: Adrian Toomes, known as Vulture, is a criminal who uses a winged suit and operates out of New York City.
lairLocation: Abandoned warehouse, New York City, USA

name: Doctor Doom
details: Victor Von Doom is a brilliant scientist and ruler of Latveria, often depicted with a lair inspired by German castles.
lairLocation: Castle Doom, Latveria (fictional, inspired by German castles)

name: Ultron
details: Ultron is an AI robot created by Tony Stark, who seeks to wipe out humanity, often operating from a hidden base.

name: Scar
details: Scar is the antagonist of 'The Lion King,' known for his treacherous plot to take over the Pride Lands.

name: Ursula
details: Ursula is the sea witch from 'The Little Mermaid' who resides in a dark underwater lair.

name: Maleficent
details: Maleficent is the evil fairy from 'Sleeping Beauty,' residing in the Forbidden Mountain.

name: Jafar
details: Jafar is the royal vizier of Agrabah in 'Aladdin,' with a secret lair beneath the palace.
lairLocation: Agrabah Palace (inspired by Mecca), Saudi Arabia

name: Cruella de Vil
details: Cruella de Vil is the villain from '101 Dalmatians,' known for her obsession with fur coats.
